评论详情: Super cute, soooo soft and fits true to size. I love love love it
This shirt is so cute and fits to your body in a flattering way (coming from someone that is a 38DDD) that makes me so so comfortable.

I like this top a lot! It's very soft and looks really cute. It's definitely a crop top, so there's not a lot of length to it, but I like that about it. It feels nice, it looks the way the product image looks (obviously not as good as how it looks on the model, but the shirt itself is the same). And I just really like it!
Very cute but too big in the straps. Returning.
Better than expected. It’s not loose but not overly body hugging either. Would actually buy again in a different colour, but I don’t usually wear a crop top.
